summary: This is an email forwarding an invitation from the FBI Victim Services Division to victims of Jeffrey Epstein, inviting them to attend informational meetings in New York or Florida in October 2019 to learn about available victim services. The email includes an attachment with a guest list.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are being invited to the FBI Victim Services Division briefing.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing in Florida
events.description: A meeting held by the FBI Victim Services Division for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in Miramar, Florida.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing in New York
events.description: A meeting held by the FBI Victim Services Division for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in New York, NY.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Invitation Sent
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division sends out invitations to victims of Jeffrey Epstein for informational meetings.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division organized briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019.
Meetings were scheduled in both Florida (Miramar) and New York City to accommodate victims.
Participation was limited to the victim and one support person.
The document references an active investigation with case number NY-3027571.
The forwarded email includes an attachment named 'contact_list_only_31E-NY-3027571_6.26.2020.xlsx', suggesting a guest list for the briefing.
